Trade/Device Name(s): RIGHTEST Blood Glucose Monitoring System Max Tel
RIGHTEST Blood Glucose Test Strip Max
RIGHTEST Blood Glucose Meter Max Tel
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): RIGHTEST Blood Glucose Meter Max Tel
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for RIGHTEST Blood Glucose Monitoring System Max Tel, an OTC glucose test system using amperometric detection.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertip, forearm, or palm for self-testing by individuals with diabetes, to monitor effectiveness of diabetes control (not for diagnosis or neonatal use).
